friends.targetUserUpdated: Now tracking user {{userIds}}. Focused targeting activated.

friends.targetUserRemoved: Removed user {{userId}} from target list. Now tracking {{count}} users.
friends.immediateResponseMusic: Immediately responding to {{username}} listening to {{songName}} by {{artistName}} on {{playerName}}.
